---
id: rotate-workspace-encryption-key
title: "RotateWorkspaceEncryptionKey"
description: "Rotates the workspace encryption key. Generates a new encryption key and re-encrypts all secrets with the new key. This is a critical operation that should be done during low-traffic periods."
sidebar_label: "RotateWorkspaceEncryptionKey"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/api/superposition
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"RotateWorkspaceEncryptionKey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/workspaces/{workspace_name}/rotate-encryption-key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Rotates the workspace encryption key. Generates a new encryption key and re-encrypts all secrets with the new key. This is a critical operation that should be done during low-traffic periods.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
